other_tests.findings: Increased theta activity and decreased alpha activity
Bilateral decrease in peroneal nerve compound motor action potential amplitude
Mercury concentration of 876 mg/kg in the herbs, serum concentration of 23.2 ng/mL, urine concentration of 14.8 ng/mL
other_tests.changes_over_time: After treatment, serum mercury level dropped to 3.1 ng/mL and urinary level to 3.9 ng/mL

other_tests.findings: Protein level at 6.0 g/L and high urinary N-acetyl b-D glucosamine (NAG) level at 27.5 U/24 hours
other_tests.changes_over_time: Residual proteinuria with a protein level of 2.5 g/L and a urinary NAG level of 14.5 U/24 hours after treatment
